Projects

Here are some small projects I worked on as part of my academic curriculum and an interest to refine my frontend skills.

NEWSVIEWS (Angular)  Live Project

  • An Angular 8 App that use the Google News API to get the latest headlines and displays it with Angular material UI.

    • Parts Depot Web Service (Course: Web Services, UM-Dearborn)

  • RESTful web service using Java JAX-RS (Jersey) implementation to return an XML document containing the list of parts in stocks, a Web service that returns detailed information about a specific part, a Web service to submit a Purchase Order (PO) in XML format in MySQL.
  • Designed a RESTFUL API and also created a client to consume it. Implemented using Java JAX_RS(Jersey library)
